title: The Bengals reach the Super Bowl if _______. Best WR in 2022? AFC East checklist; Can Vikings challenge Packers?
itunes:title: The Bengals reach the Super Bowl if _______. Best WR in 2022? AFC East checklist; Can Vikings challenge Packers?
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins looking at how the Cincinnati Bengals can get back to the Super Bowl. Hosts Will Selva, James Palmer, Mike Garafolo, and Super Bowl champion Michael Robinson share what needs to happen in Cincinnati for the Bengals to have consecutive Super Bowl appearances and then the GMFB crew analyzes how the Minnesota Vikings can challenge the Green Bay Packers in the NFC North. Later, the guys breakdown each team in the AFC East and provide insights into what would be a successful season for each team, with Michael Robinson making a dynamic prediction about Josh Allen. The show finishes up with the GMFB panel discussing which receiver will have the best season this year - find out which hosts picked Colts WR Michael Pittman Jr and Bengals WR Ja’Marr Chase.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
